Delivery Management System

Business Case

The feature film business is complex, and is still based on paper. I worked with Warner Bros to understand the business problem, interview users, and design and iterate a prototype system for managing all assets electronically. The prototype is currently being shown to Warner Bros executives.

  • Roles: UX, Product Management
  • Client: Warner Brothers
  • Date: Fall 2014
  • Agency: Levels Beyond
